resources.string: You will receive a mail that will contain a link to reset your password

I believe everyone should have a safe and healing place to work through lif e\'s difficulties. I try to help bring families and couples closer together through therapeutic work and help to have fulfilling relationships.

Hi there! My name is Ezichi Ani and I am a trauma counselor. I am empathetic towards anyone who is in a tough situation, I provide a safe space for healing and growing or just if you need a listening ear. I am kind, I definitely do not judge, My pronouns are she/her. I would like you to know that tough times never last, tough people do. It\'s only a cliche cause it\'s true.
